title: Charming 2 Bedroom House in Bella Vista with Patio and Deck
description:
This picture perfect house is loaded with charm. A beautiful brick facade offers fantastic curb appeal and once inside, a nicely appointed extended trinity awaits. Bella Vista is one of the most sought-after neighborhoods in the city. It's home to Philly's historic Italian Market and numerous culinary hot spots. Right around the corner from famous Angelo's Pizzeria. Walk to even more delightful bistros, gourmet food shops, friendly cafes, fine restaurants, and local pubs. The Meredith School catchment makes the address even more coveted.
This home is nothing short of charming and the well-organized floor plan features a sunny kitchen with cherry cabinets and granite countertops, a perfectly-sized dining area and a lovely living room. Glass sliders guide you to a quaint backyard, perfect for a quiet reading session, dinner al fresco or just relaxing under the sun.
On the second floor you'll find a spacious bedroom flooded with natural light and a large closet. Adjacent is an ancillary room perfect for a dressing room or office followed by a clean and modern full bath. The third floor contains a lovely primary bedroom and private deck, suited for entertaining or relaxing. You'll feel like you are sleeping in a serene loft nestled in the tree tops.
The home boasts hardwood floors throughout, central air and loads of classic, original details. The clean, dry basement also houses the washer, dryer, and additional storage. The Bella Vista Neighborhood Association provides a variety events ranging from environmental walks to garden tours to happy hours, so there's no such thing as a boring moment here. Enjoy the best of South Philly's artistic and historical highlights, and welcome home!
No Cats Allowed. Dogs OK on a case by case basis.
Listing provided by Compass Pennsylvania LLC

title: CLARION MODEL Condo! Cook’s Kitchen with Gleaming Hardwood Floors
description: A CLARION MODEL Condo in the RESERVE AT GWYNEDD, the area's finest 55+ gated community. It has all that you would want and so much more. There are 2 Bedrooms plus a separate Den (can be used as 3 Bedroom), 2 full Baths, a large Living Room, a Dining Room and a Cook’s Kitchen and the Largest Balcony of any model. This home is tastefully decorated and meticulously maintained with many upgrades. The eat-in kitchen has all Stainless Steel appliances (2021) including a double oven and French style refrigerator with 2 lower drawers. The counters are quartz and the cabinets are 42”. The cozy octagon dining room with Tray Ceiling opens to the living room to allow a table to open to serve 20+ people for large parties. The Den has double glass doors to allow it to serve as an office, TV room, guest room or all 3. This room has a double closet for great storage. The Primary Bedroom with its trey ceiling is big enough for large bedroom furniture plus a sitting area. The primary bath has a soaking tub, walk in shower, double sink, make up area, walk-in closet, linen closet and separate toilet area. The second bedroom with its double closet, currently used as an office. Even the second bath with the tile shower is special. There is also a separate laundry room with storage galore with Full Sized stack-able washer and dryer. There are gleaming hardwood floors throughout the main living spaces. All this plus new HVAC and Hot Water systems installed in 2020. For more storage and ease of living, the lower level of the building has a deeded parking spot and storage locker. They are in the prime location - the parking spot and storage are the ones closet to the elevator. In case this is not enough to keep you busy in this lovely condo, living at Reserve at Gwynedd includes a FULL TIME activities director who is busy scheduling parties, trips, lectures, games and much more. Enjoy the lovely facilities with one of the most beautiful indoor pools in this part of the country plus hot tub, outside pool, gym, billiard room, library and game room. Come for the condo, stay for the fun. GIVE YOUR NUMBER TO MORE INFORMATION.

The eat-in kitchen has all Stainless Steel appliances (2021) including a double oven and French style refrigerator with 2 lower drawers.  The counters are quartz and the cabinets are 42”. The cozy octagon dining room with Tray Ceiling  opens to the living room to allow a table to open to serve 20+ people for large parties. The Den has double glass doors to allow it to serve as an office, TV room, guest room or all 3. This room has a double closet for great storage. The Primary Bedroom with its trey ceiling is big enough for large bedroom furniture plus a sitting area. The primary bath has a soaking tub, walk in shower, double sink, make up area, walk-in closet, linen closet and separate toilet area. The second bedroom with its double closet, currently used as an office.   Even the second bath with the tile shower is special. There is also a separate laundry room with storage galore with Full Sized stack-able washer and dryer. There are gleaming hardwood floors throughout the main living spaces.  All this plus new HVAC and Hot Water systems installed in 2020.  For more storage and ease of living, the lower level of the building has a deeded parking spot and storage locker.  They are in the prime location - the parking spot and storage are the ones closet to the elevator.  In case this is not enough to keep you busy in this lovely condo, living at Reserve at Gwynedd includes a FULL TIME activities director who is busy scheduling parties, trips, lectures, games and much more. Enjoy the lovely facilities with one of the most beautiful indoor pools in this part of the country plus hot tub, outside pool, gym, billiard room, library and game room. Come for the condo, stay for the fun. GIVE YOUR NUMBER TO MORE INFORMATION.

title: ~~~Nice 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom High-speed WiFi, Coworking Space, Pool
description:
show contact info
Proudly and meticulously constructed by Cutler Homes. Located in one of the hottest neighborhoods in Philadelphia, Brewerytown. This is new construction at it's finest. As you enter your new home your are greeted by the Hardwood Avalanche Natural Oak floors that flow throughout your new home on the main and upper levels. Your lovely new home is elegantly staged and you already feel like there's no place like your new home. You step into the living room and really like all of the natural sunlight coming in through the windows. Next you enter into the dining room area and start to enjoy the open floor plan that floats from the living room through the dining room area and into the kitchen with Thassos White Quartz countertop and island. Standing in your new kitchen just makes your jaw drop and mouth water as you imagine all of the meals you will prepare and enjoy in your new home. Your kitchen is complimented with shaker cabinets with slow closing drawers and stainless steel appliances that consist of refrigerator, stove, microwave, and dishwasher. You peak into the back yard and love the amount of outdoor space you have to entertain guests. You step back inside and head to the lower level which is fully finished with a den area that can be used as an exercise room, theater room, home office or whatever your imagination leads you to. The fully finished basement features a full bathroom with vanity, toilet, and a custom tiled stand up shower. You step into the fourth bedroom that can be used by guests who stay over or extend it into an in-law suite. So far you are filled with excitement and can't wait to head upstairs to check out the rest of your new home. Once at the top of the stairs of the second level, you open the hallway double doors to find a front load washer and dryer that makes it so convenient for laundry. You step into the bedroom and like how nicely sized it is with ample closet space and additional storage space on top of the closet for when switching your wardrobe from season to season. You head towards the next bedroom and stop to check out the second bathroom that features vanity, toilet, and tub/shower with custom tiled walls surrounding the tub. Now you step into the next bedroom and really like how big it is and notice that it also has a large closet with additional storage space on top of it. You head to the third level which is the master suite with walk-in closet and the master bathroom. As soon as you enter you are amazed on how big the master bedroom is and how beautifully it is staged. You walk around to take it all in from each angle and as you head into the walk-in closet you stop and can picture yourself waking up every morning to this beauty. Your master bathroom features vanity, toilet, and a massive stand up shower. You open the tempered shower glass door and it's like love at first sight. You look up and notice that the shower comes with two rain fall shower heads and this just completes your new home with the cherry on top. Now you head up to the rooftop and the views are spectacular. You are really thrilled to have toured your new home and can't wait to unpack. Your gorgeous home is located right next to 30th and Jefferson Street Park with a basketball court, baseball field, and playground. It is within walking distance to popular coffee shops, Cafe de Lave, iMunch, 29 Oxford Restaurant, Otto's Taproom, Spot Gourmet Burgers, Fit Academy, and easy access to the Art Museum, Center City, 76, and so much more. Schedule to see now and submit your application today. The keys to your new home await you....

title: This 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath, fully renovated 2-story contemporary in Lexton Woods f
description: Enter the gorgeous 2-story foyer with handsome hardwoods that flows into your carpeted living room with plenty of natural sunlight shining through the windows. The bright floor plan continues into the formal dining room with chair rail and chandelier. A fantastic Goebel Cabinetry eat-in kitchen with tiled backsplash, 2 islands, including a separate breakfast bar featuring 3 skylights above, affords abundant cabinet and counter space and everything the family cook can ask for as head chef including Wolfe Stainless Steel Ovens, stainless KitchenAid dishwasher, 6 burner Wolfe stove, built-in stainless under counter microwave & two Blanco Faucets. Access the expansive rear deck from here or head into the great room/family room with fireplace and another set of doors exiting outside onto the deck. Returning inside and towards the front/side of the house is a modern mud room with doggie wash station, laundry area with skylight, and interior access to the garage. A conveniently located powder room with granite topped vanity completes this layout before ascending the open staircase to the carpeted bedroom level. The primary suite, with 2 double closets, double vanity, stacked stone over Kohler air tub, and separate frameless shower, radiant floor heat & Runfal heated towel rack is a welcome respite at the end of each day. Three additional bedrooms, each with great closet space and lighted ceiling fans share a hall bath with double vanity and a tub with sliding glass doors. Tenant occupied, please respect the privacy of occupants and please DO NOT TRESPASS!!! Feel free to drive by the home to check out the area.
